verses.text: \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3389"\w* \w became|strong="H4427"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3389"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w thirty-one|strong="H7970"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*. \w His|strong="H2977"\w* mother’s \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w Jedidah|strong="H3040"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Adaiah|strong="H5718"\w*; she \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w Bozkath|strong="H1218"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H3477"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w walked|strong="H3212"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* father \w David|strong="H1732"\w*; \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w turn|strong="H5493"\w* \w aside|strong="H5493"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w left|strong="H8040"\w*. Funding the Temple Repairs (2 Chronicles 34:8–13)

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w eighteenth|strong="H8083"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* reign, \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*, \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Azaliah, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Meshullam|strong="H4918"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, saying,

“\w Go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H5927"\w* \w count|strong="H8552"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H5971"\w* \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* \w into|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w doorkeepers|strong="H8104"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* collected \w from|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w supervisors|strong="H6485"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* \w doing|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w turn|strong="H5414"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w workmen|strong="H4399"\w* \w repairing|strong="H2388"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* damages \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*—

\w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H1129"\w* \w carpenters|strong="H2796"\w*, \w builders|strong="H1129"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w masons|strong="H1443"\w*—\w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w buy|strong="H7069"\w* \w timber|strong="H6086"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* dressed stone \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w repair|strong="H2388"\w* \w the|strong="H1129"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* need \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w account|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w work|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* integrity.” Hilkiah Finds the Book of the Law (2 Chronicles 34:14–21)

\w Then|strong="H5414"\w* \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*, “\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Book|strong="H5612"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Law|strong="H8451"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*!” \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w read|strong="H7121"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w* \w went|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w reported|strong="H5414"\w*, “\w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w paid|strong="H5414"\w* \w out|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w workers|strong="H4399"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w supervisors|strong="H6485"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.”

Moreover, \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, “\w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w has|strong="H4428"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w book|strong="H5612"\w*.” \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w* \w read|strong="H7121"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Book|strong="H5612"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Law|strong="H8451"\w*, \w he|strong="H4428"\w* \w tore|strong="H7167"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* clothes

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w* \w the|strong="H6680"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, Ahikam \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w*, \w Achbor|strong="H5907"\w* \f + \fr 22:12 \ft Achbor is another name for Abdon; see 2 Chronicles 34:20.\f* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Micaiah|strong="H4320"\w*,\f + \fr 22:12 \ft Micaiah is a variant of Micah; see 2 Chronicles 34:20.\f* \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w* \w the|strong="H6680"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Asaiah|strong="H6222"\w* \w the|strong="H6680"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6680"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*:

“\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w inquire|strong="H1875"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w book|strong="H5612"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H5971"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w burns|strong="H3341"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* fathers \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w book|strong="H5612"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w doing|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*.” Huldah’s Prophecy (2 Chronicles 34:22–28)

\w So|strong="H1696"\w* \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, Ahikam, \w Achbor|strong="H5907"\w*, \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Asaiah|strong="H6222"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Huldah|strong="H2468"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w prophetess|strong="H5031"\w*, \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w wife|strong="H1696"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shallum|strong="H7967"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Tikvah|strong="H8616"\w*,\f + \fr 22:14 \ft Tikvah is a variant of Tokhath; see 2 Chronicles 34:22.\f* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Harhas|strong="H2745"\w*,\f + \fr 22:14 \ft Harhas is a variant of Hasrah; see 2 Chronicles 34:22.\f* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w keeper|strong="H8104"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* wardrobe. \w She|strong="H1931"\w* \w lived|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w Second|strong="H4932"\w* District.\f + \fr 22:14 \ft Or the Second Quarter, a newer section of Jerusalem; Hebrew the Mishneh\f*

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* Huldah said \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w*, “\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘Tell \w the|strong="H3541"\w* man \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w*

\w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H7451"\w* \w calamity|strong="H7451"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H3427"\w*, \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w book|strong="H5612"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w read|strong="H7121"\w*,

\w because|strong="H4616"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* \w Me|strong="H5800"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w burned|strong="H6999"\w* \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w other|strong="H2088"\w* gods, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w might|strong="H4616"\w* \w provoke|strong="H3707"\w* \w Me|strong="H5800"\w* \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w anger|strong="H3707"\w* \w with|strong="H3027"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w works|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*. \w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w kindled|strong="H3341"\w* \w against|strong="H3027"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w quenched|strong="H3518"\w*.’

\w But|strong="H8085"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w inquire|strong="H1875"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w tell|strong="H8085"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w As|strong="H1697"\w* \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*,

\w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w tender|strong="H7401"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w humbled|strong="H3665"\w* \w yourself|strong="H3665"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w what|strong="H2088"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H3427"\w*, \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w desolation|strong="H8047"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w curse|strong="H7045"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w torn|strong="H7167"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* clothes \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w wept|strong="H1058"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*,’ \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

‘\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w indeed|strong="H2005"\w* gather \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* fathers, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* gathered \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w grave|strong="H6913"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*. \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w calamity|strong="H7451"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.’” \w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w brought|strong="H7725"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w answer|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.
